prime.gui.effects.UIElementEffects

type
class
implements
prime.core.traits.IDisposable
available in
swf
Container with empty slots for effects that will be bound to events that happen in an IUIElement.

Constructor

new(target : prime.gui.core.IUIElement)

Instance Variables

enabled : Bool

Enable/disable all effects for the current target

hide(default,accessor) : prime.gui.effects._UIElementEffects.EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'hide' method of the target is called. This effect will stop the 'show' effect if it's playing.

move(default,accessor) : prime.gui.effects._UIElementEffects.EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the coordinates of the targets layoutobject have changed.

resize(default,accessor) : prime.gui.effects._UIElementEffects.EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the size of targets layoutobject is changed.

rotate(default,accessor) : prime.gui.effects._UIElementEffects.EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'rotate' method of the target is called.

scale(default,accessor) : prime.gui.effects._UIElementEffects.EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'scale' method of the target is called.

show(default,accessor) : prime.gui.effects._UIElementEffects.EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'show' method of the target is called. This effect will stop the 'hide' effect if it's playing.

target(default,null) : prime.gui.core.IUIElement

Instance Methods

inline disable() : Void

dispose() : Void

inline doesntHave(prop : Int) : Bool

inline enable() : Void

inline has(prop : Int) : Bool

inline isPlayingHide() : Bool

inline isPlayingShow() : Bool

playHide() : Void

playMove() : Void

playResize() : Void

inline playRotate(endV : Float) : Void

inline playScale(endSx : Float, endSy : Float) : Void

playShow() : Void
